sn12.59:4.2: “Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.59:5.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti hoti … pe ….
sn12.59:6.1: Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti na hoti.
sn12.59:7.2: Atha puriso āgaccheyya kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya … pe …
sn12.59:7.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti na hoti.
